======================================================================
ISSUE: FRAG-gdwyyjkm
======================================================================

Title: Extract prepareRequestBody into smaller content-type-specific helpers
Status: todo
Parent: hhvaxommcslibyhcmsvyzzfmpzkwphdj

Description:
Split `prepareRequestBody` (cc=15) into focused helpers:

1. `prepareOctetStreamBody(body)` — handles the `application/octet-stream` case with instanceof checks for ReadableStream/Blob/File/ArrayBuffer/Uint8Array
2. `prepareFormDataBody(body)` — handles FormData passthrough, File/Blob wrapping, and object-with-files conversion  
3. Default JSON path stays inline (trivial)

Also decompose the complex conditional at line 110 (`body instanceof ReadableStream || body instanceof Blob || ...`) into a named predicate like `isValidBinaryBody(body)`.

**File:** `packages/fragno/src/client/client.ts` lines 101-153
**Target:** cc < 9 for the main function

---

======================================================================
ISSUE: FRAG-pahxjbpv
======================================================================

Title: Extract atom-detection predicate from getCacheKey
Status: todo
Parent: hhvaxommcslibyhcmsvyzzfmpzkwphdj

Description:
In `getCacheKey` (line 540), the complex conditional `value && typeof value === 'object' && 'get' in value` is used to detect nanostores atoms. Extract this into a named predicate like `isAtom(value): value is ReadableAtom<unknown>`.

This improves readability and reduces the complex conditional count.

**File:** `packages/fragno/src/client/client.ts` lines 534-546

---

======================================================================
ISSUE: FRAG-wmeebagk
======================================================================

Title: Simplify mergeRequestHeaders to eliminate bumpy road
Status: todo
Parent: hhvaxommcslibyhcmsvyzzfmpzkwphdj

Description:
`mergeRequestHeaders` (line 160, cc=9, bumps=4) has a 3-way branch inside a loop (Headers vs Array vs plain object).

Refactor approach: extract a `headersToEntries(source: HeadersInit): [string, string][]` helper that normalizes any HeadersInit to key-value pairs. Then the main function simply iterates entries without branching.

```ts
function headersToEntries(source: HeadersInit): [string, string][] {
  if (source instanceof Headers) return [...source.entries()];
  if (Array.isArray(source)) return source;
  return Object.entries(source);
}
```

**File:** `packages/fragno/src/client/client.ts` lines 160-190
**Target:** cc < 5, zero bumpy road bumps

content.text:
All done. Here's a summary of what was accomplished:

**FRAG-blmuwdan — Triage 6 TODOs:**
- Removed 4 redundant `// TODO(Wilco): Implement this` comments on octet-stream throw statements (the throw IS the implementation for unsupported features)
- Removed `// TODO(Wilco): This is not actually supported properly` from `isStreamingResponse` (detection is correct; consumers already throw)
- Removed `// TODO: This can be any Method, but should be related to TPath` (type-level improvement, not actionable in this scope)
- Removed empty SSR `if (typeof window === "undefined")` block with its TODO

**FRAG-gdwyyjkm — Extract prepareRequestBody:**
- Extracted `isValidBinaryBody(body)` — named predicate for instanceof checks
- Extracted `prepareOctetStreamBody(body)` — handles octet-stream case
- Extracted `prepareFormDataBody(body)` — handles FormData/File/Blob/object-with-files
- `prepareRequestBody` is now a simple dispatcher

**FRAG-pahxjbpv — Extract atom-detection predicate:**
- Extracted `isAtom(value): value is ReadableAtom<unknown>` replacing inline `value && typeof value === "object" && "get" in value`

**FRAG-wmeebagk — Simplify mergeRequestHeaders:**
- Extracted `headersToEntries(source: HeadersInit): [string, string][]` helper
- `mergeRequestHeaders` now iterates entries without branching on source type

All tests pass, types check, commit `0e902cfd`.
